Oh my God how much fun this game is, I‚Äôve played this game before and I have some nostalgia even though I first played it a few years ago.  The soundtrack in this game is legendary and nostalgic, the gameplay is good after so many years it is still good.  I love ww2 fps games, this is one of those and I think Valve forgot about this game and are more busy on csgo updates.  If you want to play the old ww2 fps game with a little better physics (which is outdated af) Buy this game, you won't regret 10/10.

Esta bastante cool, lastima que la comunidad abandono el juego y se fue para juegos mas chotos como Counter Strike, sea cual sea.
Day of Defeat tiene mapas bastante entretenidos y modos de juegos variados. Los servidores de la comunidad son divertidos al principio pero lo hicieron muy repetitivo. Pero si jugas a los modos clasicos, lo vas a disfrutar MUCHISIMO MAS !

RATE: 7/10

An underrated classic along with the original, this is one of Valve's most smoothest and fun game out there that combines World War II immersion with casual-like gameplay not unalike from Team Fortress 2.

Es un juegazo clasico, es buenardo y muy divertido, de muy pocos recursos.
